casebody.data:
No. 11-143. Pilgrim Films & Television, Inc., et al., Petitioners v. Larry Montz, et al. 565 U.S. 1021, 132 S. Ct. 550,

181 L. Ed. 2d 410,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 7979. November 7, 2011.

Motion of Reveille LLC, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of California Broadcasters Association, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 649 F.3d 975.
